scripts.build:macos: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js -t node18-macos-x64 --output platforms/pdcli-macos
scripts.build:win: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js -t node18-win-x64 --output platforms/pdcli-win
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js -t node18-linux-x64 --output platforms/pdcli-linux
scripts.build:all: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js -t node18-macos-x64,node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64 --output platforms/pdcli
